mapper.sql: id, name, service_tel, province, city, district, contacts, contacts_phone, address, remark, create_user, create_time, is_delete
mapper.select: select , (SELECT name from sys_china s where s.id = p.province)as p_name, (SELECT name from sys_china s where s.id = p.city)as c_name, (SELECT name from sys_china s where s.id = p.district)as d_name from provider p where p.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT count(e.id) eqsCount, pc.id,pc.name,pc.service_tel,pc.province,pc.city,pc.district,pc.contacts,pc.contacts_phone,pc.address,pc.remark,pc.create_user,pc.create_time,pc.is_delete FROM equipment e RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT p.*, c.id cid FROM provider p LEFT JOIN company c ON p.id = c.provider_id ) pc ON e.company_id = pc.cid GROUP BY pc.id
mapper.update: update provider set is_delete = #{isDelete} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into provider (id, name, service_tel, province, city, district, contacts, contacts_phone, address, remark, create_user, create_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into provider
id,
name,
service_tel,
province,
city,
district,
contacts,
contacts_phone,
address,
remark,
create_user,
create_time,
is_delete,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{district,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update provider
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_tel = #{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
district = #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contacts_phone = #{contactsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update provider set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_tel = #{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district = #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts_phone = #{contactsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
